name: Vasilis Tavoularis
story: Theofilos Baros was born and raised in a small village in Greece. He joined the military as soon as he turned 18 and has been serving ever since. He is a skilled marksman and has been deployed to various hotspots around the world. Despite being away from his family for long periods of time, he remains devoted to his wife and children. He is known for his calm and focused demeanor, which makes him an asset in high-pressure situations.
